theme.name: theme
theme.tip: changes visual theme for all plots

savefig.pad_inches.name: savefig.pad_inches
savefig.pad_inches.tip: padding to be used, when bbox is set to 'tight'

axes.titlepad.name: axes.titlepad
axes.titlepad.tip: pad between axes and title in points

sns.despine.offset.name: sns.despine.offset
sns.despine.offset.tip: Absolute distance, in points, spines should be moved away from the axes

sns.despine.trim.name: sns.despine.trim
sns.despine.trim.tip: If True, limit spines to the smallest and largest major tick on each non-despined axis.

xtick.major.pad.name: xtick.major.pad
xtick.major.pad.tip: distance to major tick label in points

xtick.minor.pad.name: xtick.minor.pad
xtick.minor.pad.tip: distance to minor tick label in points

ytick.major.pad.name: ytick.major.pad
ytick.major.pad.tip: distance to major tick label in points

ytick.minor.pad.name: ytick.minor.pad
ytick.minor.pad.tip: distance to minor tick label in points

first_obs.name: first_obs
first_obs.tip: Defines the start value of the moving average. Window: set start according tothe defined window size. Start: set start at the first value.

subplot-components.name: subplot-components
subplot-components.tip: Groups energy components in bar plot

representation.name: representation
representation.tip: The metric representing the error line. SD, the Standard Deviation, describes the data distribution around the mean, while SEM, the Standard Error of the Mean, describes how representative the mean is of the population.

remove-molid.name: remove-molid
remove-molid.tip: Removes R/L labels from residue names

light_count.name: light_count
light_count.tip: Defines the number of light sources
